dateCreated.description: Internal field, indicates when the invoice was first created in the Blaze system

attachedToEntityId.description: The Blaze Id of the entity to which the note is attached. E.g. is this is an invoice note, it will be a Blaze invoice id; if this is an invoice group note this will be the invoice group id.

document.description: A document attached to the note

extension.description: The file extension of the document

dateCreated.description: Internal field, indicates when the invoice was first created in the Blaze system

connectionTypeCode.description: Identifies the source system of the document

statusText.description: Can contain informative text about the document status, especially for Broken documents

externalId.description: The id of the document provided by the external system

dateModified.description: Internal field, indicates when the invoice was last modified in the Blaze system

internalUrl.description: Image URL for the document in the internal document store

mimeType.description: The mime type of the document - used internally to resolve HTTP responses

status.description: The status (health) of the document: P = Pending resolution from an external system, K = OK, X = Broken, I = Ignored
